dcterms:description: A multi-lingual, multi-modal UI grounded dataset for step-by-step task completion on smartphones containing 4,184 tasks across 8 languages, including how-to queries, step-by-step instructions in English, and sequences of UI screenshots and actions.
dcterms:title: UGIF-DataSet

dcterms:creator: Yang Li
Jiacong He
Xin Zhou
Yuan Zhang
Jason Baldridge
dcterms:description: A dataset that maps natural language instructions to mobile UI action sequences, providing voice and text queries in eight languages, instruction steps in English, and UI screens in eight system languages.
dcterms:title: PixelHelp

dcterms:creator: Daniel Toyama
Philippe Hamel
Anita Gergely
Gheorghe Comanici
Amelia Glaese
Zafarali Ahmed
Tyler Jackson
Shibl Mourad
Doina Precup
dcterms:description: An open-source platform for training reinforcement learning agents on Android, designed to facilitate research in UI navigation.
dcterms:title: AndroidEnv
